name: Maze Swipe
description:
The best Maze game that anyone can easily enjoy with simple swipe!

[Features]
- try all the 400 stages!
- no play limit such as heart, play as much as you can!
- can play even without network!
- can play even in Airplane mode!
- ultra-light app of less than 10M, feel free to download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages


Homepage:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4931745640662708567
